ruleEntry.formula: AND( ISNEW(), CreatedById = "005700000016aec", Is_Spam__c = FALSE, (OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Console_Case", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Console_CS_Lightning")))

AND( OR( CONTAINS(Email_Origin__c , "UGSDCOMMUNICATIONS"), CONTAINS(Email_Origin__c , "ITINCIDENTNOTIFICATIONS"), CONTAINS(Email_Origin__c , "GRP_UGSD.COMMUNICATIONS"), CONTAINS(Email_Origin__c , "DL_UWPEPUSSALL"), CONTAINS(Email_Origin__c , "ITINCIDENTNOTIFICATIONS"), CONTAINS(Email_Origin__c , "PCLAN")), RecordTypeId = "01270000000DyVG" )
